___attributeDomains.description: list stating the domains of the attributes. Attributes are listed accodring to the feature order and then their attribute number.

___min.description: minimal value that the attribute can take

___max.description: maximal value that the attribute can take

___constraints.description: constraint derived from the FM. Their grammar is defined in SpecificationGrammar.g4

___contextDomains.description: list stating the domains of the context. The order matters.

___min.description: minimal value that the context can take

___max.description: maximal value that the context can take

___selectedFeatures.description: list representing wich features are selected

___attributeValues.description: list representing the intial values of the attributes. The values of the attributes of non selected features are set to the maximum.

___attributesPerFeature.description: list stating the number of attributes for array. The order of the features matter.

___preferences.description: preferences derived from the user. Their grammar is defined in SpecificationGrammar.g4
